ygData.subject: Still Stranded....
ygData.msgSnippet: Indeed it isn t. I deleted all the stuff with swearing from the board, and if people don t stop swearing, I m gonna start moderating. I m just back from school

Indeed it isn't. I deleted all the stuff with swearing from the board, and if 
people don't stop swearing, I'm gonna start moderating. I'm just back from 
school and not in a really good mood.

::Ramulus::

Ramulus frowns, tapping a few keys as Brix walks off. He sighs at the 
reports, going on to deactivate the auto-pilot system.

Ramulus walks out of the shuttle. "The shield isn't enough, Brix, it won't 
hold it."

He sighs, looking back at the shuttle. "I think we'll either need to 
completely repair the thing, or ask the CF for another one," he looks up, 
frowning at the blue planet which was his home, "But I think we're waaaay out 
of comm range."

Ramulus looks at Brix again. "Do you think Fliq's internal repairs will be 
enough?"
